page.title: 15YOUNG PEOPLE'S CLUBS
page.content: { J.A.C CLUB { } J.A.C CLUB started ten years ago in 1975. It is held every Friday - around 35 to 45 children go each week and it costs 20 pence to get in. Every week there is something different to do. One week we could have games and another week there could be a disco. J.A.C CLUB can brighten you up if you are bored. There are refreshments and a lady called Jill serves the sweets. It starts at 5.45 and finishes at 7.15. Sometimes we go on visits to the Ice Bowl. Some other things we do at J.A.C CLUB are sweet making and activities, which include Rounders, Football, Keep Fit and Gymnastics. There were not many things for the boys to do so a snooker table was bought for them to use and a table tennis table as well.
